data.actual_result: It acts like autodetection was off, resulting in no voice being transmitted due to what you did at step 3
data.expected_result: It should automatically detect your voice and transmit it
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to User settings > Voice & Video - Enable Voice Activity, and switch off "Automatically determine input sensitivity" - Slide the sensitivity bar all the way to the right so it's all yellow - Toggle on "Automatically determine input sensitivity" - Speak to make sure the bar can turn green in settings - Close settings and join a voice channel - Speak
